articles.author: Alana Wise
articles.title: A spine-tingling discovery: This dinosaur had spiked body armor - NPR
articles.description: In a new paper, researchers describe a bizarre dinosaur with thorny spines along its neck and back that made its home in Africa more than 165 million years ago.
articles.content: A dinosaur that roamed modern-day Morocco more than 165 million years ago had a neck covered in three-foot long spikes, a weapon on its tail and bony body armor, according to researchers who unearthe… [+2532 chars]
